What is Unify?

Unify is a convention-based static site generator that uses pure HTML with minimal custom elements.

Note

This site uses convention-based architecture with automatic layout discovery.

Key Features

ðŸŽ¯ Convention-Based

Unify uses file naming conventions instead of configuration for layouts and components.

How It Works

  1. Pages are automatically wrapped with the nearest layout file
  2. Content goes into slots using <template target="name">
  3. Components are included with <!--#include virtual="..." -->
  4. Layout files use naming pattern _*.layout.html
